mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.post_id, c.user_id, u.username AS author_username, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM post_comments c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comments (post_id, user_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post_comments WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
